Introduction¶

Welcome to the documentation of inchikeyMIRIAM. This project parses SBML files, scans the species cross-references and tries to find the appropriate inchikeys. If found, its added to the same MIRIAM annotation.

Usage¶

First build the rpBase and rpCache dockers before building the local one:

docker build -t brsynth/inchikeymiriam-standalone:v2 .

The docker can be called locally using the following command:

python run.py -input_sbml input_sbml.xml -output_sbml output_sbml.xml

API¶

class inchikeyMIRIAM.inchikeyMIRIAM¶

Bases: object

This class holds the cache information used by the scripts

addInChiKey(input_sbml, output_sbml)¶

Check the MIRIAM annotation for MetaNetX or CHEBI id’s and try to recover the inchikey from cache and add it to MIRIAM

Parameters

  • input_sbml (str) – SBML file input

  • output_sbml (str) – Output SBML file

Return type

bool

Returns

Success or failure of the function

class run.main¶

Function to call the local docker to run the script

Parameters

  • output_sbml (str) – Path to the output SBML file

Return type

None
